name: Basketball Dunk
description:
Free game Basketball Dunk

Get as many points as you can!

The most addictive basketball game has been released in 2k22. Basketball Dunk is spreading all over the world and becoming the best offline mobile basketball game.

Basketball Dunk is an endless game that challenges you to maximum levels. Come on, join everyone around the world, beat the high scores with Basketball Dunky become basketball stars.

Basketball Dunk, you just need to tap anywhere on the screen to move the ball up. Hit, hit and shoot! You earn a score. Hit the hoops as many as you can to get higher scores and reach higher levels.

Basketball Dunk is absolutely the most compelling game ever.

It comes with the following features:

Game that can never limit your ultimate ability.

Very simple game, play with one finger.

Free game Basketball Dunk.

World leaderboard.

Unlock achievements with your score.

If you are a fan of basketball game, Basketball Dunk is a must play game on your phone. Join people from all over the world to discover your limitless ability!

Install Basketball Dunk now, grab the ball and shoot the hoops!

Free game Basketball Dunk
